casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Donald KING. No. 204A99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2007. Diane Reeves, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of February *5982007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (King) shall have up to and including the 28th day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her petition with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2007."
